# 🛟 Aquaband Defender – Water Safety Innovation

## 📖 Project Overview

Aquaband Defender is a GPS-enabled safety band designed to prevent water accidents among children and hobbyists. This project includes market research, SWOT analysis, competitive benchmarking, and a full launch strategy.

---

## 🎯 Objectives

- Raise water safety awareness
- Launch in Irish market targeting parents and water enthusiasts
- Achieve first-year sales of 2,500+ units
